title: emote bug error code: EM01 and EM05,
body: cant acces emotes keep getting an error(error code: EM01 and EM05, how i can fix this problem?

replies.body: Those two errors sometimes happen if the client doesn't correctly grab that info from the server, so it might be a good idea to try [**adjusting your firewall settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#wq3) for League. There's also an issue we're working on fixing where players with over 20 emotes get this error too, but hopefully those firewall steps help fix this!
